languages.text: "Будет исполнено! Как затем пожелаете распорядиться судном?"
"Certainly! And what use did you have in mind for the ship afterward?"
languages.original_text: "Будет исполнено! Как затем пожелаете распорядиться судном?"

traits.locale_text: "Absolutely! And what use did you have in mind for the ship afterward?"
"Absolutely! And what use did you have in mind for the ship afterward?"
"Certainly! And what use did you have in mind for the ship afterward?"
"Certainly! And what use did you have in mind for the ship afterward?"
"Certainly! And what use did you have in mind for the ship afterward?"
"Certainly! And what use did you have in mind for the ship afterward?"

languages.text: «¡Por supuesto! Y ¿qué uso tiene pensado darle a la nave después?».
languages.original_text: "Certainly! And what use did you have in mind for the ship afterward?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Por supuesto! Y ¿qué uso tiene pensado darle a la nave después?».

languages.text: “没问题！等船修好之后，您打算用它做什么呢？”
languages.original_text: "Certainly! And what use did you have in mind for the ship afterward?"

traits.locale_text: “没问题！等船修好之后，您打算用它做什么呢？”

languages.text: « Ce sera fait ! Et après, quel usage comptez-vous faire du vaisseau ? »
languages.original_text: "Certainly! And what use did you have in mind for the ship afterward?"

traits.locale_text: « Ce sera fait ! Et après, quel usage comptez-vous faire du vaisseau ? »

languages.text: 「もちろんです！その後、船をどのように使うつもりだったんですか？」
languages.original_text: "Certainly! And what use did you have in mind for the ship afterward?"

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんです！その後、船をどのように使うつもりだったんですか？」

languages.original_text: "Certainly! And what use did you have in mind for the ship afterward?"

languages.text: "Sicher! Und was habt Ihr danach mit dem Schiff vor?"
languages.original_text: "Certainly! And what use did you have in mind for the ship afterward?"

traits.locale_text: "Sicher! Und was habt Ihr danach mit dem Schiff vor?"
